pages.text: $(thing)Vulcanes$() are a unique type of weapon, that isn't used in the way a traditional weapon might be.$(br)Instead of using a $(thing)vulcane$() to outright attack an enemy, it feeds off the $(thing)anger$() that builds up as you take damage.$(br2)Once enough has been built up, use your $(thing)vulcane$() to deal pure, raw, $(l)retribution$().
pages.title: Vulcanes

pages.text: At their core, $(thing)vulcanes$() will sit mostly inactive in your inventory. Once you have built up enough $(thing)rage$(), the next thing that attacks you will be marked as a potential target for a short time.$(br)With a sufficient amount of $(l:aoa3:rage#rage)rage$(/l) and a target marked, use the $(thing)vulcane$() and the target will be immediately struck with pure damage, striking straight through any armour they may have.
Revenge is a dish best served brutally, in the face.
pages.title: A Vulcane

pages.text: Find info on all of the $(thing)vulcanes$() in $(aoa) on the $(thing)official wiki$().
